experiences.description: Leading frontend development for enterprise applications using React, TypeScript, and modern CSS frameworks.
responsibilities: Architected and implemented scalable frontend solutions for enterprise clients
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews
Optimized application performance, reducing load times by 40%
Implemented CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment

experiences.description: Developed responsive web applications for clients in various industries using modern JavaScript frameworks.
responsibilities: Built 20+ client websites using React and Vue.js
Collaborated with UX designers to implement pixel-perfect interfaces
Integrated RESTful APIs and third-party services
Implemented responsive design principles for cross-device compatibility

experiences.description: Built and maintained web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Collaborated with senior developers.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained company website and internal tools
Assisted in debugging and resolving production issues
Participated in Agile development processes and daily standups
Learned and implemented modern development practices
